title: ayyA sharaNam
sahitya:
ayyA sharaNam ayyappA sharaNam caraNam
		(madhyamakAla)
oyyAdu ulagOngum un padinen padimEl vIN matipOl viLangum


anupallavi

  meyyAi oru taram nin mahimai unai kETTu
		(madhyamakAla)
manamurugi urugi unai marandiDAdu idu vidamum vandiDum aruL tara


caraNam    en manakkavalai tIrttu rakSippadun bhAram
tani marai tandOrkku kaLaivadal un dhIram
anbillAdevarkkum nI AvAi vegu dUram
aDiyEn tudittukinra AvA vinai tIrkkum
